examples.example: 虽然我今天有点难受，但我相信明天会更好。

translate.english: Although I feel a little uncomfortable today, I believe tomorrow will be better.

examples.example: 当我看到朋友难受时，我会主动去关心和安慰他。

translate.english: When I see my friend feeling bad, I will take the initiative to care about and comfort him.

examples.example: 当我身体有些难受时，朋友们都纷纷来关心我，让我感到特别温暖。

translate.english: When I feel a little uncomfortable physically, friends all come to care about me one after another, making me feel extremely warm.
